abstract: The billionaire financier Carl C. Icahn and the hedge fund Eastbourne Capital Management have succeeded in ousting the chairman of Amylin Pharmaceuticals as well as its lead independent director, giving them a bigger-than-expected victory in their hard-fought proxy fight.
snippet: The billionaire financier Carl C. Icahn and the hedge fund Eastbourne Capital Management have succeeded in ousting the chairman of Amylin Pharmaceuticals as well as its lead independent director, giving them a bigger-than-expected victory in their...
lead_paragraph: The billionaire financier Carl C. Icahn and the hedge fund Eastbourne Capital Management have succeeded in ousting the chairman of Amylin Pharmaceuticals as well as its lead independent director, giving them a bigger-than-expected victory in their hard-fought proxy fight.

headline.main: In Victory for Icahn, Amylin Chairman Is Ousted
